value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.12006v1", "title": "Comment on Path integral measure and RG equations for gravity", "summary": "Asymptotic safety is a candidate for a predictive quantum theory of gravity\nand matter. Recent works (arXiv:2412.10194 and arXiv:2412.14108) challenged\nthis scenario. We show that their arguments fail on a basic level.", "main_category": "hep-th", "categories": "hep-th", "published": "2025-04-16T12:00:22Z"}
